  • Package net.xqhs.flash.core.composite

    • Class net.xqhs.flash.core.composite.CompositeAgent extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -2693230015986527097L

      • Serialized Fields

        • agentContext

          java.util.ArrayList<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> agentContext
          The list of all contexts this agent is placed in, in the order in which they were added.

        • agentName

          java.lang.String agentName
          The agent name, if given.

        • agentState

          CompositeAgent.AgentState agentState
          The agent state. See CompositeAgent.AgentState. Access to this member should be synchronized with the lock of eventQueue.

        • agentThread

          java.lang.Thread agentThread
          The thread managing the agent's life-cycle (managing events).

        • asContext

          Entity.EntityProxy<Agent> asContext
          The proxy to this agent.

        • eventQueue

          java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<AgentEvent> eventQueue
          A synchronized queue of agent events, as posted by the shards or by the agent itself.

        • localLog

          net.xqhs.util.logging.UnitComponent localLog
          *EXPERIMENTAL*. This log is used only for important logging messages related to the agent's state. While the agent will attempt to use its set name, this may not always succeed. This log should only be used by means of the CompositeAgent.log(String, Object...) method.

        • shardOrder

          java.util.ArrayList<AgentShard> shardOrder
          A List that holds the order in which shards were added, so as to signal agent events to shards in the correct order (as specified by AgentEvent.AgentSequenceType).

          It is important that this list is managed together with CompositeAgent.shards.

        • shards

          java.util.Map<AgentShardDesignation,​AgentShard> shards
          The Map that links shard designations (functionalities) to shard instances.

        • supportLink

          Entity.EntityProxy<Pylon> supportLink
          This can be used by support implementation-specific shards to contact the support implementation.

        • USE_LOCAL_LOG

          boolean USE_LOCAL_LOG
          This switch activates the use of the CompositeAgent.localLog.

      serialVersionUID:
      -8282262747231347473L

      • Serialized Fields

        • isRunning

          boolean isRunning
          Indicates the state of the shard.

        • parentAgent

          ShardContainer parentAgent
          The CompositeAgent instance that this instance is part of.

        • shardConfiguration

          MultiTreeMap shardConfiguration
          Creation data for the shard. The field is initialized with an empty structure, so that it is guaranteed that it will never be null after construction.

        • shardDesignation

          AgentShardDesignation shardDesignation
          The designation of the shard, as instance of AgentShardDesignation.StandardAgentShard.

        • padLen

          int padLen
          Is updated with the longest length of a key; used for pretty printing without calculating the longest key every time.

        • simpleKeys

          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> simpleKeys
          Keys that have String values.

        • singletonKeys

          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> singletonKeys
          Keys that should only hold one value (can be simple or hierarchical).

        • treeKeys

          java.util.Set<java.lang.String> treeKeys
          Keys that have MultiTreeMap values.

    • Class net.xqhs.flash.sclaim.constructs.ClaimFunctionCall extends ClaimConstruct implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          java.lang.String functionName

        • functionType

          ClaimFunctionType functionType
          Used to know whether the function is a Java one or a language one, case in which the field will indicate also the function itself.
